name: Covid Vaccinator
description:
A game jam game. 

VR only! Built using a Vive with Godot Engine. If you have other headsets, I'd love to know what doesn't work!

You can pass in some command line arguments:

  • --import=/path/to/a/custom/beat/saber/map/directory
  • --start-offset=.75     <- a time in seconds, for fudging bad music sync
  • --settings=/path/to/optional/json/settings"
  • --scale=1.0
